column4: Got a question. if I mount a filesystem using sshfs twice (same command line, same location etc). Will I get 2 sshfs processes? or does it check for existing connections first? or will it fail because there is already a volume mounted on that mountpoint?
I used the live cd.. but X is always a bit of a problem =)
Did you fix it? I mean the X problems?
yes.. it was nothing big.. but there are lots of small annoyances.. nothing that kept it from running
